testcase.name: TC18 Negatif login testi yapip ilk sayfaya donebilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "wdu_url" ana sayfasinda....................................passed Then kullanici loginPortal'a kadar asagi iner...............................passed And kullanici loginPortal'a tiklar..........................................passed And kullanici diger window a gecer..........................................passed And username kutusuna deger yazar...........................................passed And password kutusuna deger yazar...........................................passed Then login butonuna click yapar.............................................passed And popUp'ta cikan yazinin validation failed oldugunu test eder.............undefined Then OK diyerek popUp'i kapatir.............................................skipped And ilk sayfaya geri doner..................................................skipped Then ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder......................................skipped And acilan tum sayfalari kapatir............................................skipped
